title: Public Key
alt: I guess I should be signing stuff, but I've never been sure what to sign. Maybe if I post my private key, I can crowdsource my decisions about what to sign.
transcript:
[In the first panel, Cueball is sitting in a chair and is using a laptop.]
Cueball (thinking): I've been posting my public key for 15 years now, but no one has ever asked me for it or used it for anything as far as I can tell.[This is followed by two beat panels where Cueball just sits there. doing nothing, not even thinking.][In the final panel he again uses his laptop and thinks.]
Cueball (thinking): Maybe I should try posting my private key instead.
